column2:
"Yes, I got the report. Your application for the
unrestricted exploration permit won't be delayed.
I expect great things from you."

"...and well, the regulated report
ended like that.
So, now listen to what I have to say."

"The approval of your free exploration
also means that you're required to perform
a spontaneous probe."

"Your talents will be greatly needed
to maintain the security of the
coast from here on."

"Please live up to these expectations.
I believe that
you can do it."
